newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunisie-Leasing plans dinar bond issue.
newsitem.headline: Tunisie-Leasing plans dinar bond issue.

text.p: Tunisian leasing company Tunisie-Leasing plans a seven million dinar ($6.86 million) five-year bond issue, the company said in a statement received on Monday.
It said the yield would be 10.25 percent for notes payable in equal annual tranches, and 11 percent for paper payable at maturity. The notes will be issued at a nominal 100 dinars each.
Tunisie-Leasing share was last priced at 46.44 dinars on the Tunis Stock Exchange.
